metadata.synopsis: Third AD line in second phase of Kerri's combat. She's becoming emotionally volatile - losing control altogether.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1) Go to CTY_Main_A -248; 30; -462) oe LOW_OskarsBeloved_CombatReadyKerriSpirit3) Make kerri reach 50% 4) Third turn after  kerri transforms into spirit, will say line

0.speaker: Kerri Evenfield
0.text: Oskar dies with me. Such a pretty picture we'll make.
0.context: NodeContext: Angry, toying with Oskar - active combat AD
